entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:38 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. High minus 29.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
